name: Bluebook Demon Value
description:
Butterschotch Shenanijam  2017 entry

[Ep95] Bluebook Demon Value

Demon_bluebook_value_walkthrough from Collider on Vimeo.

Kill enough enemies to buy stronger enemies so you can purchase the boss (and defeat him) at the end. 

Very rough prototype, just the bare basics of a platformer so far...
